name: Local Bushel, Co.
description: Developer of an e-commerce platform designed to deliver high-quality, harvested to order ingredients from local and sustainable farms to the end users. The company's e-commerce platform deliver high-quality, harvested fruits and vegetables from local and sustainable farms, enabling consumers to avail fresh quality foods with a reliable delivery option.
one_liner: Developer of an e-commerce platform designed to deliver high-quality, harvested to order ingredients from local and sustainable farms to the end users. The company's e-commerce platform deliver high-quality, harvested fruits and vegetables from local and sustainable farms, enabling consumers to avail fresh quality foods with a reliable delivery option.
